hypothesis_content.title: BTC Bollinger Band Squeeze Breakout with Volume Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC enters a Bollinger Band squeeze (20-period BB width < 0.5% of price) during NEUTRAL regime, the subsequent directional breakout with 2x average volume will continue for at least 3% before mean reversion.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Bollinger Band squeezes indicate compression of volatility, which often precedes explosive moves. Volume confirmation filters false breakouts. NEUTRAL regime provides optimal balance between trend potential and mean reversion risk.
entry_conditions: BTC 20-period Bollinger Band width < 0.5% of current price (squeeze)
Price closes outside either Bollinger Band (breakout)
Volume on breakout candle > 2x 20-period average volume

exit_conditions.take_profit: 3% move from entry price in breakout direction
exit_conditions.time_exit: 48 hours if neither TP nor SL hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout direction fails to continue for 3% in >60% of occurrences within 48 hours, or mean reversion occurs immediately after breakout.
